Welcome to DHIS 2 Fundamentals!

We are very excited that you have decided to join us to learn more about DHIS 2. Before we get started, we would like to provide you with some important information.

You will be using this openedX platform to watch the video’s, access readings, solve the challenges and partake in discussions to help you get the most out of the material that is provided. If you have a poor internet connection, please note that video’s, transcripts of the videos and handouts can also be downloaded for studying offline.

If you are unsure about how to navigate the openedX platform, you may wish to take a short demo course created by openedX to orient learners like you. The demo course can be accessed (here). We also have an ongoing discussion, which we will be checking regularly, where you can post any questions or issues you may have with the platform.

We will be communicating with you regularly to let you know what we have learned and how we are developing the platform further, highlight your contributions and questions; and keep you updated on any developments in relation to the course that may be of interest for you.

Please be sure to take our important pre-course survey. The results are anonymous and will give us a sense of where you are coming from and how we can better ensure the course speaks to your interests.

Also, we encourage you to introduce yourself in the discussion forum, and tell us and your fellow students a little bit about yourself, how you are using DHIS2 and what you hope to gain from the course. Apart from learning from the course material, we hope you will use the forum to learn from each other.

And most importantly, have fun!

Matthieu, Hodo and Ellen

Welcome to the DHIS2 Fundamentals online course and thank you for joining us!

Before getting started we recommend you to read the Guidlines available on the right of this update.

Once you have read through these Guidlines, click on the "Course" button located up top.

To access the DHIS 2 systems, look to the right of this update. There are links to the Trainingland and Customisation systems respectively. Make sure you have registered for an account before trying to log in!

This is the 1st version of this course, we will update this course with more hands-on activities in the coming days, so stay tuned. These updates will have no impact on your grading Happy DHIS2 learning!

Dear Students,

many of you have completed the DHIS2 Fundamentals course. Congratulations!

We initially designed this course as a self-paced course and opened during 6 weeks. The eligible students were meant to receive a completion certificate at the end of the course.

Due to the success of this DHIS2 Fundamentals course, we decided to open it for more than 6 weeks and allow new students to enroll and complete. This has an impact on the generation of your certificates.
As we don't want you to wait until the updated end date of the course, we are currently implementing a solution to generate individual certificates upon completion. This means that soon all the students who have completed the course will receive an email with a unique link to access their certificate.

To all the students who have completed the DHIS2 Fundamentals course, thanks for your patience. To all the students who are currently, completing the course, let us wish you a fruitful learning experience.

All the best,
Matthieu
